name: Sad But Ded
description:
Sad But Ded - it's a free puzzle-platformer, whose main feature is limited number of available player actions per level. In addition, each level has different mechanics, which make difficult run much more :)

Actually, game control designed to touch screens, so i highly recommend try to play on mobile version (when i publish it -_-)

Features:

  • 35+ levels with completely different mechanics;
  • Limited player controller;
  • 3 difficult mode (easy, normal, hard);
  • Speedrun mode

Coming soon:

  • Android version;
  • Desktop version; - added 7/21/2020
  • More levels with new mechanics (at least 50 :))

Any ideas/questions/find bug?

If you have any ideas/questions/bugs - please don't hesitate to contact me, i very appreciate it. You can post a comment, send an email or private message (actually, i don't now is it possible on itch.io yet :O)

Speedrun:

Game has a speedrun mode, so please post screenshots with your best time to comment. Let's find the best player :)
